name: bunny's adventure (sorbit)
description:
Help bunny on her adventure to the outside world in this Sokoban-style puzzle game! With four short levels, playing through the game takes no more than five minutes.

This is my first game ever! While it isn't much, it's been a great experience making a game start to finish, and I had a lot of fun drawing all the art for it. I hope you'll enjoy playing it. :)

Controls
  • move with the arrow keys or wasd
  • reset the level with R
Credits

Music: A Journey In To The Great Unknown by Squire Tuck

Font: Game Over Font by Mariano Diez

Color Palette: Lost Century 24 by CalmRadish

Game Engine: Godot 3.4.3

This game was made for the Pixel Game Jam 2022.
